content: चीनः [चि-नक् पृषो° दीर्घः] {@--1@} <ab>N.</ab> of a country, the modern China. {@--2@} A kind of deer. {@--3@} A sort of cloth. {@--4@} A thread. --नाः ({%<ab>m.</ab>%} <ab>pl.</ab>) The rulers or people of China. --नं {@--1@} A banner. {@--2@} A kind of bandage for the corners of the eyes. {@--3@} Lead.
